questions.text: What is Darth Vader's real name?
questions.explanation: Anakin Skywalker became Darth Vader after turning to the dark side of the Force.

questions.text: What year was the first Star Wars film released?
questions.explanation: Star Wars (later titled A New Hope) was released on May 25, 1977.

questions.text: What species is Chewbacca?
questions.explanation: Chewbacca is a Wookiee from the planet Kashyyyk.

questions.text: Who is Luke Skywalker's father?
questions.explanation: Darth Vader reveals he is Luke's father in The Empire Strikes Back.

questions.text: What is the name of Han Solo's ship?
questions.explanation: The Millennium Falcon is the iconic modified YT-1300 light freighter piloted by Han Solo.

questions.text: What planet is Princess Leia from?
questions.explanation: Princess Leia is from Alderaan, which was destroyed by the Death Star.

questions.text: What color is Yoda's lightsaber?
questions.explanation: Yoda wields a green-bladed lightsaber.

questions.text: Who said 'I have a bad feeling about this'?
questions.explanation: This iconic line is said by various characters throughout the Star Wars films.

questions.text: What is the Sith name of Count Dooku?
questions.explanation: Count Dooku's Sith name is Darth Tyranus.

questions.text: Who killed Jabba the Hutt?
questions.explanation: Princess Leia strangled Jabba with her chains in Return of the Jedi.

questions.text: What is the name of the ice planet in The Empire Strikes Back?
questions.explanation: The Rebel Alliance had their base on the ice planet Hoth.

questions.text: What weapon does a Jedi use?
questions.explanation: A lightsaber is the signature weapon of both Jedi and Sith.

questions.text: Who trained Luke Skywalker?
questions.explanation: Luke was trained by both Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda.

questions.text: What is the name of the furry creatures on Endor?
questions.explanation: The Ewoks are the small, furry inhabitants of the forest moon of Endor.

questions.text: What is the Emperor's real name?
questions.explanation: The Emperor is Sheev Palpatine, also known as Darth Sidious.

questions.text: What planet does Obi-Wan Kenobi live on in hiding?
questions.explanation: Obi-Wan lived in exile on Tatooine, watching over young Luke Skywalker.

questions.text: What is the name of Anakin's mother?
questions.explanation: Shmi Skywalker was Anakin's mother on Tatooine.

questions.text: Who is the clone template for the Clone Army?
questions.explanation: Jango Fett was the genetic template for the entire Clone Army.

questions.text: What creature did Luke ride on Hoth?
questions.explanation: Luke rode a tauntaun across the frozen plains of Hoth.

questions.text: What is the famous bar on Tatooine called?
questions.explanation: The Mos Eisley Cantina is where Luke and Obi-Wan met Han Solo.

questions.text: What is Kylo Ren's real name?
questions.explanation: Kylo Ren was born Ben Solo, son of Han Solo and Leia Organa.

questions.text: Who composed the Star Wars music?
questions.explanation: John Williams composed the iconic Star Wars score and themes.

questions.text: What color is Mace Windu's lightsaber?
questions.explanation: Mace Windu's unique purple lightsaber was a special request by Samuel L. Jackson.

questions.text: What is the Rebel Alliance's motto?

options.A: May the Force be with you
options.C: I have a bad feeling about this

questions.explanation: 'May the Force be with you' became the iconic phrase of the Rebellion and Jedi.

questions.text: What is the name of the Sith homeworld?
questions.explanation: Various Sith worlds include Korriban (later Moraband), Mustafar, and Exegol.

questions.text: Who said 'Do or do not. There is no try'?
questions.explanation: Yoda said this famous line while training Luke on Dagobah.

questions.text: What is the name of the planet where Anakin and Obi-Wan duel?
questions.explanation: The volcanic planet Mustafar is where Anakin becomes Darth Vader after losing to Obi-Wan.

questions.text: What is Padmé Amidala's profession?
questions.explanation: Padmé was Queen of Naboo and later became a Galactic Senator.

questions.text: What is the name of the garbage compactor monster?
questions.explanation: The dianoga is the tentacled creature in the Death Star's trash compactor.

questions.text: Who was Qui-Gon Jinn's apprentice?
questions.explanation: Obi-Wan Kenobi was Qui-Gon Jinn's Padawan before training Anakin.

questions.text: What spice is smuggled in the Star Wars universe?
questions.explanation: Spice from the mines of Kessel is a valuable and illegal substance.

questions.text: What is the Kessel Run measured in?
questions.explanation: Han Solo made the Kessel Run in 'less than 12 parsecs,' a measure of distance not time.

questions.text: What is the name of the droid protocol droid?
questions.explanation: C-3PO is the gold-plated protocol droid fluent in over 6 million forms of communication.

questions.text: What is the name of the Rebel base planet in Return of the Jedi?
questions.explanation: The Rebel Alliance gathered on the forest moon of Endor to destroy the second Death Star.

questions.text: Who killed Qui-Gon Jinn?
questions.explanation: Darth Maul killed Qui-Gon Jinn during the Battle of Naboo.

questions.text: What is the name of the Death Star's weakness?
questions.explanation: A small thermal exhaust port led directly to the reactor, which Luke exploited.

questions.text: What is Rey's heritage?
questions.explanation: Rey is revealed to be Emperor Palpatine's granddaughter but takes the Skywalker name.

questions.text: What is the name of the Mandalorian creed?
questions.explanation: Mandalorians follow 'The Way,' saying 'This is the Way' as their motto.

questions.text: Who is Boba Fett's father?
questions.explanation: Boba Fett is an unaltered clone of Jango Fett, raised as his son.

questions.text: What is the name of Han Solo's co-pilot?
questions.explanation: Chewbacca is Han Solo's loyal Wookiee co-pilot and best friend.

questions.text: What is the name of the forest moon?
questions.explanation: The forest moon of Endor is home to the Ewoks.

questions.text: Who said 'These aren't the droids you're looking for'?
questions.explanation: Obi-Wan used a Jedi mind trick on stormtroopers with this famous line.

questions.text: What is Ahsoka Tano's species?
questions.explanation: Ahsoka Tano is a Togruta, recognized by her head-tails and montrals.

questions.text: What is the name of the Sith Rule?
questions.explanation: The Rule of Two states there can only be a Master and an Apprentice at any time.

questions.text: Who destroyed the first Death Star?
questions.explanation: Luke Skywalker fired the shot that destroyed the first Death Star.
